name: Samsung/samsum
description: The SAMSum Corpus is a unique dataset of over 16,000 chat dialogues, each accompanied by a human-written summary. Developed by Samsung, this corpus is a valuable resource for researchers and practitioners in the field of NLP, particularly in the area of abstractive summarization. The SAMSum Corpus provides a diverse range of dialogues, offering a challenging and realistic test bed for developing and evaluating chat dialogue summarization models.
creator: Samsung
